questions.question: What is your organization or product name?
questions.description: Used throughout the policy to identify the organization

questions.question: What systems does this IAM policy cover?
questions.placeholder: SaaS platform, internal tools, cloud infrastructure
questions.description: Defines the scope of systems the policy applies to

questions.question: Which environments are included in this policy?
questions.description: Lists all environments the policy covers

questions.question: What authentication method does your organization use?
questions.description: Primary method used to authenticate users

questions.question: What access control model is implemented?
questions.placeholder: Role-Based Access Control (RBAC), Attribute-Based Access Control (ABAC), Discretionary Access Control (DAC)
questions.description: Model used to manage user permissions

questions.question: How often are access reviews conducted?
questions.description: Frequency of reviewing user access rights

questions.question: Who is the IAM policy owner?
questions.description: Person responsible for maintaining and enforcing the IAM policy

questions.question: What roles and their IAM responsibilities should be documented?
questions.description: List each organizational role and their specific IAM responsibilities
